name: @baethon/extract-jsonld
description: Simple utility for extracting JSON-LD data from given URL
author: Radoslaw Mejer <radmen@radmen.info>

scripts.tag:patch: npm version patch -m 'chore(package): bump version to %s'
scripts.tag:minor: npm version minor -m 'chore(package): bump version to %s'
scripts.tag:major: npm version major -m 'chore(package): bump version to %s'
